function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased dengue risk associated with inner city parks and green spaces","Impact":"Increased risk of dengue transmission for people living near green spaces","Mitigation":"Implement mosquito control and monitoring in and around green spaces","Technologies":"Mosquito traps, insecticides, larvicides","People":"People living in dwellings close to green spaces","Owner":"Local public health authorities"},{"Description":"Temperature-dependency of mosquito vectorial capacity for arboviruses and malaria parasites","Impact":"Unintended impacts on transmission rates due to cooling green zones","Mitigation":"Monitor and control mosquito populations in green zones, adjust mosquito control strategies based on temperature changes","Technologies":"Temperature monitoring technology, mosquito surveillance tools","People":"Public health authorities, urban planners","Owner":"Public health authorities, urban planning authorities"},{"Description":"Complex urban environment and man-made containers as oviposition sites for mosquitoes","Impact":"Challenges in urban mosquito control due to the complexity of the environment","Mitigation":"Develop targeted mosquito control strategies for urban settings, educate the public about mosquito breeding sites","Technologies":"Geospatial mapping, community education tools","People":"Urban residents, public health authorities","Owner":"Public health authorities, community organizations"}]}
